Package ch.zhaw.theluckyseven.frantic.model.gamelogic

Contains the logic of Frantic, including all rules and the gameflow.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Config
    Configuration class with comm objects
    GameFlowLogic
    Class to handle the gameflow.
    GameState
    GameState class that represents in which state the game currently is
    GameStateController
    Class that controls the GameState and triggers events of cards
    PackageFactory
    Factory class for game logic to create DataPackage to be sent
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Config.CardColor
    Enum of the colors of cards
    Config.Cards
    Enum to define all Cards
    Config.GameDuration
    Enum to define the different durations of a game
    GameException.GameError
    GameError enum
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    GameException
    Custom exception in GameLogic
